comment: VERY easy class. Gave 7 quizzes (1 was dropped), attendance, and 1 project makes up entire grade. Final exam was optional (only replaced quiz grades). Lectures were packed but his energy makes it easy to get through. Highly recommend.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Amazing lectures --Graded by few things

comment: The textbook is definitely necessary. I used it for notes digitally. Get ready to study hard and use flashcards. Heavy material! Pay attention and maybe get an energy drink you'll do lots of listening.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: He seemed like a really nice guy. He responds to emails quickly. He grades projects fairly and the tests aren't too difficult as long as you study. We had 2 tests the whole semester and one project. Attendance is 20% of your grade, so make sure to go to class.

As long as you come to class and get youre assignments done youll do great in his class. Hess was an amazing professor and his lectures were actually interesting. Hes also very underestanding and will always answer his emails. Only thing is that there is not many assignments so if you miss one you might end up with a bad grade
We had a textbook, didn't have to read but it's good too. Great guy, easy going and understanding.
